sentence.text: We identified 30 new blood pressure- or hypertension-associated genetic regions in the general population, including 3 rare missense variants in hematopoietic progenitor cell differentiation, growth plate cartilage chondrocyte morphogenesis and leukocyte differentiation with larger effects (AAAA1.5 mm Hg/allele) than common variants.

Our data extend the spectrum of allelic variation underlying blood pressure negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and hypertension, provide new insights into the pathophysiology of hypertension and indicate new targets for clinical intervention

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
